certifications.title: Learning AI Through Visualization
certifications.description: This course offers a comprehensive introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning (DL) with a focus on practical applications, guiding learners through structured modules that cover foundational concepts from datasets to AI model implementation, optimization techniques, linear regression, and deep learning, while emphasizing real-world problem-solving with low-code/no-code hands-on exercises and interactive dashboards to solidify theory and enable AI-driven solution development, tailored for working professionals from entry to mid-career individuals, senior managers, and corporate executives seeking to transition into AI, particularly those aspiring to become "AI Chefs" equipped with the knowledge and skills to integrate AI into operations, enhance decision-making, and drive innovation in their organizations.

certifications.title: Backend Development and APIs
certifications.description: The Back End Development and APIs Certification covers building server-side applications with Node.js and npm, developing web apps using the Express framework, and implementing microservices with MongoDB and Mongoose, providing practical experience in modular back end architecture and API-driven development.

certifications.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
